document.full_text: during jim willett's 30 years working in the texas prison system, he was responsible for carrying out 89 executions. he has now moved on to a quieter job, running the prison museum in huntsville.
document.title: looking back on life as a death house warden
lines_and_colors: during jim willett's 30 years working in the texas prison system, he was responsible for carrying out 89 executions. he has now moved on to a quieter job, running the prison museum in huntsville.
